About Me

United States Marine Corps veteran who is detailed-oriented and results-driven. Software Developer with a commitment to delivering user-friendly solutions. Strong understanding of both back-end and front-end development.

Below, you'll find some of my projects I've been able to work on.

My Family

Full CRUD application for you to keep track of your family members documents and appointments. Caregivers of children can keep track of their height and weight.
